Posts.Content: Jun 2, 2010 03:01PM janehoop wrote: Doe, I am 6 weeks post op from my axillary node dissection.  I too have and still have the searing, burning, numbing nerve pain that you described.  My surgeon put me on a drug called Nurontin; the generic is Gabapentin and it works.   It is usually given to patients wtih Shingles as it specifically helps with nerve pain.  I don't know what I would do without it.  That and PT have helped me a lot.  Maybe you have tried it already, but thought I would throw it out there.  I am about to start my 6 weeks of radiation treatments and I'm really nervous and trying to be brave.
Posts.Title: Am in so much pain lionessdoe kira
